Projects.Name: Trading Grounds
Projects.Overview: An educational application that simulates the stock market using current real time stock prices, allowing users to gain experience in buying, selling, and tracking a portfolio. This app also allows the users to experience the highs and lows of the stock market and gain experience while not risking the loss of actual capital.
Projects.Tech Stack: HTML5 | CSS3 | Handlebars.js | MySQL Workbench | Materialize CSS Library

Projects.Name: Clicky Game
Projects.Overview: A Memory Game application built with React.js and themed on 1980’s Movie Soundtracks.
Projects.Tech Stack: React.js | HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript/JSX | ES6 | Bootstrap CSS Library

Projects.Name: New York Times Search Engine
Projects.Overview: This is a React-based article search application for the New York Times. It utilizes the React mounting lifecycle to query and display articles based on three criteria: search topic, start date and end date.
Projects.Tech Stack: React.js | HTML5 | CSS3 | JSX | ES6 | Bootstrap CSS Library
